page.title: 15PEOPLE'S OPINIONS-CATTERICK
page.content: Residents mode of thinking and attitude towards various subjects takes several directions. International, national and local affairs are all topics of conversation. Nuclear war is uppermost in the minds of people surrounded as the area is by Ministry of Defence property, a prime target for any nuclear attack. Many argue that a nuclear deterrant is necessary wheras others argue that it only enhances the chance of nuclear warfare. The state of the country, racial unrest and civil disturbances are all topics of conversation. Being a farming community the everyday worries are, the weather, general state of farming, the common market policies, prices at the fat stock market, the rising cost of machinery and ever increasing land rent
